title: £130 P/W ROOM IN NW London
body:
QR Code Link to This Post


Hi, I have a nice double room with fridge and sofa next to Colindale station.

Another single room to share with another tenant. This room is nice tidy in a 2 bedroom house. You will pay £50 and I will pay £50 every week.

It will suit a working female that can keep the place clean.

All bills inclusive 
Wifi, Netflix Train station, shops, pubs, bars restaurants Tesco bustop all within 3 mins walk.

WhatsApp me on 07741474069 to move in. Michael
